title: Glitching/laggy game not fps or ping
body:
i get some weird glitchy animation mostly when i have the camera on my own champion i tried alot capping fps vsync,reinstall full windowed borderless fps and ping look to be great

replies.body: Oh wow, yea Blitz is having some major malfunctions there. It could be caused by some corrupted game files, but I did notice that your FPS is a biiiiit high. Let's see if we can smooth that out and calm Blitz down a bit as well. Check out [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to cover the typical FPS problems, but let me know if that doesn't help!
done all of that still same issues
seems less an issue in borderless,but is in fullscreen

That's good if it's less of an issue in borderless, but let's see if we can make those champions chill out for good. Let's get you in touch with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they can do a little more digging than I can here on the boards.
